name: Minimalist Kickass Torrents
description: A simple script to help get rid of some of the clutter on the Kickass Torrents website as well as helping to make the site more usable.
additional_info:
I made the code a bit easier to navigate through and just cleaner in general. 
It should be pretty easy to modify for those who don't want the website as
empty as I have it.

Also, if you guys are feeling generous I'd really appreciate it if you donated to my Pledgie campaign! It doesn't have to be much... Just a dollar or two. Everything helps!
